comment:
* Stores App Compat information about a particular Task.
 * @hide

variables.name: topActivityEligibleForLetterboxEducation
variables.comment: * Whether the direct top activity is eligible for letterbox education.

variables.name: isLetterboxEducationEnabled
variables.comment: * Whether the letterbox education is enabled

variables.name: topActivityInSizeCompat
variables.comment: * Whether the direct top activity is in size compat mode on foreground.

variables.name: isLetterboxDoubleTapEnabled
variables.comment: * Whether the double tap is enabled.

variables.name: topActivityEligibleForUserAspectRatioButton
variables.comment: * Whether the user aspect ratio settings button is enabled.

variables.name: isUserFullscreenOverrideEnabled
variables.comment:
* Whether the user has forced the activity to be fullscreen through the user aspect ratio
     * settings.

variables.name: isSystemFullscreenOverrideEnabled
variables.comment: * Whether the system has forced the activity to be fullscreen

variables.name: topActivityBoundsLetterboxed
variables.comment: * Hint about the letterbox state of the top activity.

variables.name: isFromLetterboxDoubleTap
variables.comment: * Whether the update comes from a letterbox double-tap action from the user or not.

variables.name: topActivityLetterboxVerticalPosition
variables.comment:
* If {@link isLetterboxDoubleTapEnabled} it contains the current letterbox vertical position or
     * {@link TaskInfo.PROPERTY_VALUE_UNSET} otherwise.

variables.name: topActivityLetterboxHorizontalPosition
variables.comment:
* If {@link isLetterboxDoubleTapEnabled} it contains the current letterbox vertical position or
     * {@link TaskInfo.PROPERTY_VALUE_UNSET} otherwise.

variables.name: topActivityLetterboxWidth
variables.comment:
* If {@link isLetterboxDoubleTapEnabled} it contains the current width of the letterboxed
     * activity or {@link TaskInfo.PROPERTY_VALUE_UNSET} otherwise.

variables.name: topActivityLetterboxHeight
variables.comment:
* If {@link isLetterboxDoubleTapEnabled} it contains the current height of the letterboxed
     * activity or {@link TaskInfo.PROPERTY_VALUE_UNSET} otherwise.

variables.name: cameraCompatTaskInfo
variables.comment: * Stores camera-related app compat information about a particular Task.

methods.name: public boolean hasCompatUI()
methods.comment: * @return {@value true} if the task has some compat ui.

methods.name: public boolean isTopActivityPillarboxed()
methods.comment: * @return {@value true} if top activity is pillarboxed.

methods.name: public boolean equalsForTaskOrganizer(@Nullable AppCompatTaskInfo that)
methods.comment:
* @return  {@code true} if the app compat parameters that are important for task organizers
     * are equal.

methods.name: public boolean equalsForCompatUi(@Nullable AppCompatTaskInfo that)
methods.comment: * @return {@code true} if parameters that are important for size compat have changed.

methods.name: void readFromParcel(Parcel source)
methods.comment: * Reads the AppCompatTaskInfo from a parcel.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment: * Writes the AppCompatTaskInfo to a parcel.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
